title: #154 - Sam Roberts & ME
description: From Sirius/XM's The Opie & Anthony Show, & The Sam Roberts Show, radio host Sam Robert sits down with me in my manacle and interviews me.
content:encoded: From Sirius/XM's The Opie & Anthony Show, & The Sam Roberts Show, radio host Sam Robert sits down with me in my manacle and interviews me.
